nodes.text: The All Terrain Exploration and Survey Walker (AT-EST) was a walker design used by the Galactic Republic's civilian exploratory corps and later other groups.

The AT-EST was designed by Rothana Heavy Engineering for the civilian exploratory corps as a six-legged, low-slung walker design. It could carry 8 passengers as well as cargo. The AT-EST could traverse various hostile terrain.
The walker had one blaster cannon at the front of the vehicle and was crewed by three people, a pilot, a co-pilot and a sensor/comms operator.
A smaller variant of the AT-EST was the All Terrain Exploration Transport.
